eclectic-resonance.name: ECLECTIC RESONANCE
eclectic-resonance.desc: ECLECTIC RESONANCE are our original work branded albums. Each suffix means it’s oriented towards a specific style or genre. Make sure to check each one out to find which ones fit with your abilities and needs!

eclectic-resonance-legendaria.title: ECLECTIC RESONANCE Legendaria
eclectic-resonance-legendaria.themes: Folk / Celtic / Fantasy / Traditional / JRPG inspired

eclectic-resonance-detuned-alloy.title: ECLECTIC RESONANCE Detuned Alloy
eclectic-resonance-detuned-alloy.themes: Original Work, Rock, Hard Rock, Metal, Acoustic, Guitar Centered

eclectic-resonance-detuned-alloy-2.title: ECLECTIC RESONANCE Detuned Alloy 2
eclectic-resonance-detuned-alloy-2.themes: Original Work, Rock, Hard Rock, Metal, Acoustic, Guitar Centered

tribute-albums.name: Tribute Albums
tribute-albums.desc: Those are albums entirely dedicated to a specific series/game. Any styles and genres are accepted, so long as they follow our individual guidelines. Image songs are also accepted so long as they follow the rules.

midnight-syndrome.title: MIDNIGHT SYNDROME -a Grasshopper Manufacture tribute album-

vanilla-parfait.title: Vanilla Parfait -a Vanillaware tribute album-
vanilla-parfait.themes: Vanillaware tribute album (13 Sentinels, Muramasa, Odin Sphere...)

moonstruck-analogy-ii.title: Moonstruck Analogy -a TYPE-MOON tribute album- II

fragments-of-gratitude-ii.title: Fragments of Gratitude -a When They Cry tribute album- II

gensokyo-party.name: Gensokyo Party
gensokyo-party.desc: Those are albums entirely dedicated to the "Touhou Project" series, set in a multitude of styles.

vantablack-2.title: Gensokyo Party Vol. 5 Gensokyo Party VANTABLACK 2
vantablack-2.themes: "Gensokyo at War" (Dark Themed, Experimental, Metal, Hardcore...)

gensokyo-party-vol6-border-in-stasis.title: Gensokyo Party Vol. 6 Border in Stasis

dj-koishi.title: Gensokyo Party DJ Koishi
dj-koishi.themes: "Gensokyo on the Dancefloor" (Club Themed, EDM, Trance...)

dj-koishi-2.title: Gensokyo Party DJ Koishi 2
dj-koishi-2.themes: "Gensokyo on the Dancefloor" (Club Themed, EDM, Trance...)
